explains: adj. 愚蠢的，荒谬的；滑稽可笑的；荒诞派的
n. 荒诞，荒诞的事物 （the absurd）
wordGroup: theatre of the absurd 荒谬剧场；荒诞派戏剧

sentences.en: He has a good sense of the absurd.
sentences.cn: 他对荒诞事物有较强的识别能力。

sentences.en: His high-flown style just sounds absurd today.
sentences.cn: 他的浮夸风格如今听起来真是荒谬。

sentences.en: It was absurd and illogical to go out into such a storm.
sentences.cn: 在这样的暴风雨中外出简直是荒唐和莫名其妙。
